import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { getContact } from '../api/ContactService' export function ContactDetail({ updateContact, updateImage }) { const inputRef = useRef() const [contact, setContact] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', address: '', title: '', status: '', photoUrl: '', }) const { id } = useParams() const fetchContact = async (contact) => { try { const { data } = await getContact(id) setContact(data) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } useEffect(() => { fetchContact(id) }, []) const selectImage = () => { inputRef.current.click() } const updatePhoto = async (file) => {} const onUpdateContact = () => {} const onChange = () => {} return ( <> Back to list

{contact.name}

Email
Phone

udpatePhoto(event.target.files[0])} name='file' accept='image/*' />
) }
